thread.title: Target Reaches Settlement With Visa Over 2013 Data Breach
thread.title_full: Target Reaches Settlement With Visa Over 2013 Data Breach - WSJ

author: Robin Sidel
title: Target Reaches Settlement With Visa Over 2013 Data Breach
text:
Target Corp. has reached an agreement with Visa Inc. to reimburse card issuers up to $67 million for costs incurred by the retailerâ€™s massive data breach during the 2013 holiday shopping season, according to people familiar with the situation.
The deal comes two months after issuers unexpectedly rejected a $19 million pact that Target had...
